name: Vision to Learn
description: Vision To Learn (VTL) partners with school districts to make it easy for students to access eye care. The program includes: - Vision screenings - Eye Exams - Frame Selections - Getting New Glasses
fullDescription: Vision To Learn (VTL) partners with school districts to make it easy for students to access eye care. The program includes: - Vision screenings - Eye Exams - Frame Selections - Getting New Glasses
whatTheyOffer: Vision To Learn (VTL) partners with school districts to make it easy for students to access eye care. The program includes: - Vision screenings - Eye Exams - Frame Selections - Getting New Glasses
